briefTitle: Antiproliferative Effect of Octreotide in Patients With Metastasized Neuroendocrine Tumors of the Midgut
officialTitle: Study to Investigate the Antiproliferative Effect of Octreotide in Patients With Metastasized Neuroendocrine Tumors of the Midgut
summary: Placebo-controlled prospective randomized phase III study to investigate the antiproliferative effect of octreotide in patients with metastasized neuroendocrine tumors of the midgut

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to Tumor Progression Documented by Computed Tomography (CT) or Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
